mapper.select: SELECT vm_cloud_server.*, cloud_account.NAME AS account_name, cloud_account.platform AS platform, CASE WHEN orgWorkspace.type = "workspace" THEN orgWorkspace.id ELSE NULL END AS workspace_id, CASE WHEN orgWorkspace.type = "workspace" THEN orgWorkspace.NAME ELSE NULL END AS workspace_name, orgWorkspace.organization_id, orgWorkspace.organization_name FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_server.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace orgWorkspace ON vm_cloud_server.source_id = orgWorkspace.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

WHEN org_workspace.type = "workspace" THEN org_workspace.NAME ELSE NULL END AS workspace_name, org_workspace.organization_id, org_workspace.organization_name FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_server.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON vm_cloud_server.source_id = org_workspace.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT vm_cloud_server.*, workspace._name AS workspace_name FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN workspace ON vm_cloud_server.source_id = workspace.id WHERE vm_cloud_server.account_id = #{accountId} AND vm_cloud_server.zone = #{zone} AND instance_status != 'deleted'
